outline:
1. to be or become dark, grow dim, be darkened, be black, be hidden
    1. (Qal)
      1. to be or grow dark
      2. to have a dark colour
      3. to grow dim
    2. (Hiphil)
      1. to make dark, cause to be dark
      2. to hide, conceal
      3. to obscure, confuse (fig.)
kjv_def: be black, be (make) dark, darken, cause darkness, be dim, hide.
strongs_def: to be dark (as withholding light); transitively, to darken
